titleStmt.title: The Lords spiritual and temporal assembled at the House of Lords, Westminster, December 25, 1688.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Starkey, and Awnsham and William Churchill,

notesStmt.note: "His Highness the Prince of Orange's answer to the Lords spiritual and temporal, at St. James's, December 28, 1688."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
